description:
Salomon has updated their top tier all-mountain helmet with MIPS, making it even safer. The Husk Prime’s ergonomic shape, liner and adjustable fit keep you nice and comfy. While the dual-density shell and compound foam keep you nice and safe. When the days go from bluebird to socked in, adjustable ventilation ensures the right temperature. Little touches like the Fidlock magnetic buckle make this helmet easy to live with.

  • MIPS® technology (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. An inner shell sandwiched between the foam and the padding reduces the rotational torque on the skull
  • BOA® adjustable fit system lets you dial in the perfect fit
  • SMART safety 360° uses multiple densities of foam for increased protection
  • EPS 4D protects from direct impacts and rotational forces
  • Hybrid construction uses a combination of ABS and polycarbonate for improved durability and strength
  • Active flow ventilation keeps heads cool and reduces goggle fog
  • Merino wool blend liner is cozy and removeable for easy cleaning
  • Fidlock™ magnetic buckle with a padded chin strap
  • Perfect integration with Salomon goggles
name: Salomon Husk Prime MIPs Helmet
